Class ActionUpdaterSimulationQueue

    public abstract class ActionUpdaterSimulationQueue
extends ActionUpdaterGeneral
    ActionUpdaterSimulationQueue.java --- Updater for updating a AvailableActionsSimulationQueue instance.

    P H - 16.07.2017

      • defineScoringDirector

        protected abstract ScoringDirector defineScoringDirector()
        Function for defining which ScoringDirector should be used.
        Returns:
        the ScoringDirector which will be used for updating the scores of all Actions used in the simulations.

      • update

        public void update(BuildActionManager manager)
        Description copied from interface: Updater
        General update function which gets called when the implementing classes should update their corresponding values / references.
        Parameters:
        manager - the BuildActionManager whose properties may change.

      • updateActionTypesAndScoringActions

        private void updateActionTypesAndScoringActions()
        Function for updating the actionTypes and the scoringActions as the latter depend on the former ones. This function first extracts all information from the different Queues (training, building, etc.) (-> informationStorageQueuesActionTypes) as well as the previous simulation results (-> simulationQueueResultActionTypes). Then the generateAllAvailableActionTypes(BuildActionManager) function is called from the implementing subclass. The order must be kept due to the latter one depending on the different Queue results since some actions must not be taken whilst another one is already queued (I.e.: It is not advised / allowed for to center buildings to be queued together in order to prevent errors).

      • extractAllSimulationResultActions

        protected java.util.HashMap<TypeWrapper,java.lang.Integer> extractAllSimulationResultActions()
        Function for extracting all TypeWrappers from the actionQueueSimulationResults. These actions represent the results of the previous simulation that are still stored but not yet forwarded to the UnitControlModule / queued inside the training- / building- / addon- / research- / upgrade-Queue.
        Returns:
        a HashMap containing all TypeWrappers that are produced in the action Queue of the actionQueueSimulationResults action.
        Key: The produced TypeWrapper.
        Value: The number of times it was found inside the action Queue.

      • extractAllForwardedTypes

        protected java.util.HashMap<TypeWrapper,java.lang.Integer> extractAllForwardedTypes()
        Function for extracting all types that got forwarded into the InformationStorage's Queues and convert them to their TypeWrapper equivalent.
        Returns:
        a HashMap containing all the types that already got forwarded to the InformationStorage.
        Key: The forwarded type as TypeWrapper.
        Value: The number of times it was found inside the Queues.

      • addToTypeWrapperHashMap

        private static void addToTypeWrapperHashMap(java.util.HashMap<TypeWrapper,java.lang.Integer> hashMap,
                                            TypeWrapper wrapper)
        Function for adding a TypeWrapper to a HashMap. If the HashMap does not contain any previous instance of the TypeWrapper, instantiate it with 1. Otherwise add 1 to the existing value.
        Parameters:
        hashMap - the HashMap to which a TypeWrapper instance will be counted towards.
        wrapper - the TypeWrapper that will be added towards a HashMap.

      • generateAllAvailableActionTypes

        protected abstract java.util.HashSet<ActionType> generateAllAvailableActionTypes(BuildActionManager buildActionManager)
        Function for generating all the available ActionTypes that will be used inside the different simulations.
        Parameters:
        buildActionManager - the manager whose actions are being extracted.
        Returns:
        a HashSet containing all available ActionTypes for simulations.

      • transformAvailableActionsIntoScoringActions

        private java.util.HashSet<ScoringAction> transformAvailableActionsIntoScoringActions()
        Function for transforming the available actions into ScoringActions that can be used by the ScoringDirector.
        Returns:
        a HashSet containing all available ScoringActions for the ScoringDirector to be updated.

      • updateSimulationStarter

        private void updateSimulationStarter(BuildActionManager manager)
        Function for updating all information regarding the SimulationStarter. Either resetting existing action Queues of the ActionQueueSimulationResults instance itself when no progress is being made (fast enough) or starting a new simulation when the existing action Queue is near its end and a new Queue is needed to further progress into the game.
        Parameters:
        manager - the BuildActionManager whose properties / Actions are going to be updated.

      • isActionQueueNearlyFinished

        private boolean isActionQueueNearlyFinished()
        Function for testing if the index of the action Queue of the ActionQueueSimulationResults is nearly at the end of the action Queue.
        Returns:
        true if the max difference of the index and the size of the action Queue is being met (Else false).

      • performNextSimulation

        private void performNextSimulation(BuildActionManager manager)
        Function for performing another / the next simulation iteration. This function updates the actionTypes as well as the scoringActions with the internal updateActionTypesAndScoringActions() function. Afterwards another simulation is run.
        Parameters:
        manager - the BuildActionManager whose properties / Actions are going to be updated and which is used to access the InformationStorage instance.

      • canResearchTechnology

        protected boolean canResearchTechnology(BuildActionManager manager,
                                        ActionType actionType)
        Function for determining if a technology can be researched or not. The provided ActionType must result in a TechType. If this is not the case, the function will fail. The function tests if the Player has researched the resulting TechType of the provided ActionType and if he is currently not researching it. Also other checks are done:
        • Test if the required UnitType (Research facility) exists at least once.
        • Test if the ActionType was not already forwarded or is currently in the research Queue.
        • Test if an idling, required research facility exists.
        • Test if the required UnitType of the stored TechType exists at least once.
        Parameters:
        manager - the manager which provides access to the InformationStorage containing the current Unit counts as well as the difference Queues.
        actionType - the ActionType (Resulting in a TechType) that is going to be checked.
        Returns:
        true if all criteria regarding the research of the TechType of the provided ActionType are matched, false if not.

      • canUpgrade

        protected boolean canUpgrade(BuildActionManager manager,
                             ActionType actionType)
        Function for determining if a upgrade can be performed or not. The provided ActionType must result in a UpgradeType. If this is not the case, the function will fail. The function tests if the Player has not yet reached the maximum upgrade level of the resulting UpgradeType of the provided ActionType and if he is currently not performing it. Also other checks are done:
        • Test if the required UnitType (Upgrade facility) exists at least once.
        • Test if the ActionType was not already forwarded or is currently in the upgrade Queue.
        • Test if an idling, required upgrade facility exists.
        • Test if the required UnitType of the stored UpgradeType of the current level exists at least once.
        Parameters:
        manager - the manager which provides access to the InformationStorage containing the current Unit counts as well as the difference Queues.
        actionType - the ActionType (Resulting in a TechType) that is going to be checked.
        Returns:
        true if all criteria regarding the research of the TechType of the provided ActionType are matched, false if not.

      • doesRequiredTypeExist

        protected boolean doesRequiredTypeExist(BuildActionManager manager,
                                        ActionType actionType)
        Function for testing if the required UnitType of the provided ActionType exists at least once. This function will fail if the required type is not a UnitType!
        Parameters:
        manager - the manager which provides access to the InformationStorage containing the current Unit counts.
        actionType - the ActionType (Resulting in a TechType) that is going to be checked.
        Returns:
        true if the required UnitType exists at least once, false if not.

      • wasForwardedOrQueued

        protected boolean wasForwardedOrQueued(ActionType actionType)
        Function for testing if the provided ActionType is going to be forwarded or is currently in one of the waiting Queues of the Bot. These include the building, upgrade, training, research or addon Queue.
        Parameters:
        actionType - the ActionType (Resulting in a TechType) that is going to be checked.
        Returns:
        true if the ActionType was forwarded into one of the InformationStorage's Queues or if it is still going to be forwarded to them. Otherwise this function returns false.

      • isOneProducingFacilityIdle

        protected boolean isOneProducingFacilityIdle(BuildActionManager manager,
                                             ActionType actionType)
        Function for testing if one completed and idle facility whose UnitType was defined in the provided ActionType exists. The ActionType of this function must define a UnitType as required type. Otherwise this function returns false.
        Parameters:
        manager - the manager which provides access to the InformationStorage containing the current Units.
        actionType - the ActionType (Resulting in a TechType) that is going to be checked.
        Returns:
        true if one (Or more) idling and completed facilities that are defined as the required UnitType of the ActionType exist(s). Otherwise this function returns false, if either the required type is not a UnitType or no completed and idling Unit is found.

      • doesRequiredUnitExist

        protected boolean doesRequiredUnitExist(BuildActionManager manager,
                                        bwapi.TechType techType)
        Function for testing if a provided TechType's required UnitType is present on the map at least once.
        Parameters:
        manager - the manager which provides access to the InformationStorage containing the current Units.
        techType - the TechType whose required UnitType is going to be checked.
        Returns:
        true if the required UnitType of the provided TechType is present on the map at least once.

      • doesRequiredUnitExist

        protected boolean doesRequiredUnitExist(BuildActionManager manager,
                                        bwapi.UpgradeType upgradeType)
        Function for testing if a provided UpgradeType's required UnitTypes are present on the map at least once. These are based on the current level of the UpgradeType and must be matched before upgrading to the next level is possible.
        Parameters:
        manager - the manager which provides access to the InformationStorage containing the current Units.
        upgradeType - the UpgradeType whose required UnitTypes are going to be checked.
        Returns:
        true if the required UnitType of the provided UpgradeType is present on the map at least once for the next level.

      • doesRequiredUnitExist

        protected boolean doesRequiredUnitExist(BuildActionManager manager,
                                        bwapi.UnitType unitType)
        Function for testing if a provided UnitType's required UnitTypes are present on the map at least once.
        Parameters:
        manager - the manager which provides access to the InformationStorage containing the current Units.
        unitType - the UnitType whose required UnitTypes are going to be checked.
        Returns:
        true if the required UnitTypes of the provided UnitType are present on the map at least once.

      • doesRequiredTechExist

        protected boolean doesRequiredTechExist(BuildActionManager manager,
                                        bwapi.UnitType unitType)
        Function for testing if a provided UnitType's required TechType was already researched by the Player.
        Parameters:
        manager - the manager which provides access to the InformationStorage containing the current Units.
        unitType - the UnitType whose required TechType is going to be checked.
        Returns:
        if the required TechType of the provided UnitType was already researched.
